execution_plan.description: Retrieve all rows from store_alt.items whose created_on date falls within the entire previous calendar year.
execution_plan.query: SELECT code, title, group_ref, amount_in_cents, active, created_on FROM items WHERE created_on >= (date_trunc('year', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '1 year')::date AND created_on < date_trunc('year', CURRENT_DATE)::date;
